overview:
Kevin is the founder of bookacoach and even outside of working on making sports coaching more accessible to youth across all sports, he’s busy doing what his dad loved doing, coaching baseball. Kevin is actively involved as a volunteer youth baseball coach in the Washington, D.C. metro area.

Known on the field as Coach Mac, Kevin focuses on sharing not only core fundamentals but translating baseball to life lessons. His dad always taught him that baseball was special for a reason, it’s one of the only games that mirrors life. Kevin has prior start-up experience as the former Senior Vice President of Sales and Marketing for www.ClassWatch.com. Additionally, in college Kevin founded a 501(c)(3) organization, Indiana University Circle of Life. Circle of Life hosted the nation’s largest collegiate-hosted running event, known as the IU Mini Marathon, to fund a revolutionary endowment for scholarships awarded to cancer survivors.

Kevin graduated from Indiana University’s Kelley School of Business.

degrees.subject: Marketing
degrees.institution: Indiana University Kelley School of Business
